attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lloyds was coerced by the government to save HBOS which was within 24 hours of meltdown. Lloyds shareholders saved the taxpayer from the costs of a rescue but ended up with a collapsed share price and cessation of dividends. I petition HBOS should be taken into state ownership and Lloyds shareholders compensated.
